structure.unit: Motorboats, Other Vessels And Recreational Vehicles

law.catch_line: Requests For Information Or Records From Federal Agencies
law.text: In accordance with any request duly made by an authorized official or agency of the United States, any information compiled or otherwise available to the division whether the same be a matter of public record or information specified by this chapter as not to be released or made public shall be transmitted to said officials or agency of the United States.
